briefdescription.para: Get DMA channel remaining transfer size.

parameterdescription.para: transfer size of the channel. The width is current dma channel configured source width. Transfer total bytes are (size_in_width * source width).

transfer source width of the channel
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_BYTE
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_HALF_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_DOUBLE_WORD

transfer destination width of the channel
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_BYTE
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_HALF_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_DOUBLE_WORD

memberdef.name: dma_set_transfer_src_width_byte_size

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel transfer width and size in byte.

parameterdescription.para:
transfer source width of the channel
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_BYTE
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_HALF_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_WORD
DMA_TRANSFER_WIDTH_DOUBLE_WORD
transfer size in byte of the channel. The dma transfer size is (size_in_byte >> src_width).

destination address control mode

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source work mode.

Set DMA channel source burst size.

parameterdescription.para:
source burst size when BURSTOPT is 0, please reference follows:
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_1T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_2T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_4T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_8T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_16T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_32T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_64T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_128T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_256T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_512T
DMA_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_1024T when BURSTOPT is 1, burst size is (burstsize + 1).
